title: Maruti Suzuki looking at transporting more vehicles via railways to cut down costs and reduce emissions
description: Maruti Suzuki plans to increase railway transportation to cut costs and emissions. It has invested Rs 1081 crore to commission in-plant railway siding in Gujarat and aims to double production capacity to 4 million units per annum by the end of the decade.
